SECRET.
BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING 16th JULY, 1918.
WESTERN FRONT.
(a) French Front. According to reports received up to noon today fighting has not been renewed except astride the MARNE and in the district S.W. of RHEIMS.
In the sector E. of RHEIMS the general situation is unchanged. Astride the MARNE the enemy is exerting strong pressure in a South Eastern direction and has made some progress. The line now runs as described in today's noon Battle Situation, except between MARFAUX and NESLE LE REPONT where it runs approximately as follows:- MARFAUX (enemy) - BELVAL - LA FORTELLE - middle of BOIS DU ROI - REUIL SUR MARNE - LEUVRIGNY - BOIS DES CHATAIGNIERS - NESLE LE REPONT.
(b) British Front. The situation is unchanged.
2. ITALIAN AND MACEDONIAN FRONTS.
There is nothing to report.
General Staff,
War Office, S.W.1.
Issued at 6.35 p.m.
16th July, 1918.
